pullrequest.title: Add a test for recursively destroying nodes when there's a cycle in the node graph

content.raw:
I pushed some changes in [d83bc24](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/commits/d83bc244882205a12b6dd96f6fe3fe87417c8cdf)  that checks for loops when recursively destroying nodes. This should fix the test

I also thought about adding checks in `Node::AddChild` but abandoned it for performance reasons.
